name: MEC Ultra Lite Table
description: The Ultra Lite Table's compact aluminum design makes it easy to bring backpacking or on hikes to your favourite picnic spot. A lightweight table that collapses to almost nothing and keeps you from eating off your lap, 770g is a bargain for a lot of civility. Stable enough to adapt to a variety of ground surfaces, it’ll make you wonder what you ever did without it.Polyurethane-coated polyester table top has a DWR finish, making it easy to clean.Light and strong aluminium frame.Stable legs play well with a variety of surfaces.Dual cup holders keep spillage to a minimum.Side-mounted pockets are great for games, cutlery, condiments, etc.Zippered storage pouch makes for easy packing.
